tool_description: ScienceDirect is an online platform by Elsevier that provides access to a vast collection of scientific and medical publications, including over 18 million pieces of content. It offers a wide range of academic journals, e-books, and research articles across various fields. The platform supports complex searches using Boolean syntax, proximity operators, and wildcards, allowing users to refine their search results effectively.
